Title: Sleepy Hollow
Writer: Washington Irving (story "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow"), Kevin Yagher (screen story), Andrew Kevin Walker (screen story), Andrew Kevin Walker (screenplay)
Actors: Johnny Depp, Christina Ricci, Miranda Richardson, Michael Gambon
Plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.
Production: Mandalay Pictures, Paramount Pictures, American Zoetrope, Scott Rudin Productions
